info.description: This is a Quiz application API
info.title: Quiz API

get.description: Get all answers with pagination and filtering options

post.description: Create a new answer with the provided information

get.description: Get details of a specific answer by its ID

put.description: Update an answer with the provided information

delete.description: Delete an answer by its ID

post.description: Login with username and password to get an authentication token

get.description: Get the profile of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Register a new user with the provided information

get.description: Get all questions with pagination and filtering options

post.description: Create a new question with the provided information

get.description: Get details of a specific question by its ID

put.description: Update a question with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a question by its ID

get.description: Get all quizzes with pagination and filtering options

post.description: Create a new quiz with the provided information

get.description: Get details of a specific quiz by its ID

put.description: Update a quiz with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a quiz by its ID

get.description: Get all submissions with pagination and filtering options

post.description: Create a new submission with the provided information
Create multiple submissions in a single request

get.description: Get details of a specific submission by its ID

put.description: Update a submission with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a submission by its ID

get.description: Get all users with pagination and filtering options

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information

get.description: Get details of a specific user by its ID

put.description: Update a user with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a user by its ID
